name: Metal-Angel Shoot' em Up
description:
Metal-Angel is the first Fast Paced Vertical Shoot' em up game with many options , upgradable weapons, 3 different space ships and pixel art graphics, FX sounds and Metal music tracks. This game has been build on 2004 and updated in 2020.

How to play MetalAngel :
- Use accelerometer to fly your ship across the univers.
- Double screen tap to drop atomic bomb (green lanterns [ B ])
- Grab as many weapons improvements (golden lanterns [ B ] )
- Grab all gems (mini and maxi gems) to make bonus and combos

Metal-Angel game version for macOS is the best version yet with :
- much wider screen play
- more FX sounds
- more graphic effects
- a new song
- mouse support
- online scores.
